Produced as a project research and employment project for a third-year seminar.

The game system was designed with the desire to load as much knowledge as possible based on the culmination of university life.

I chose the genre that I like the most when playing games. And that's because I wanted to try to create an action game.

The concept of the work is that I wanted to make a work that I was satisfied with. Anyone can play in terms of system and ease of operation.

_About this game
3D jump action game.

_Starting method
With the Xbox controller connected.

_Basic operation
[xbox controller]
A: Decision / Jump / Block placement
B: Cancel / Warp
X: Attack
RB: Momentary movement
LB: Skip movie
Left stick: character movement / block movement / selection cursor movement
Right stick: Camera rotation / block rotation
START: Optional

*Only xbox controller is supported. (Only xbox360 has been tested and you may not be able to play with xboxOne etc.
